attributes.action: Consider Execution for perpetrators of extreme acts of inhumanity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People who wantonly Torture, Murder or Rape, or any other extreme acts of human rights abuse, should not then be allowed to be shielded by human rights.
They should be stripped of these and considered for Execution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
